day.activity: Arrival at New Delhi and overnight stay at airport hotel
Leave to Udaipur by morning flight - Road transfer (3 hours drive) to Bera. Afternoon lunch followed by a evening safari. Stay at Heritage villas, Bera. Dinner and cultural show at night.

Early morning Open jeep safari (after tea / coffee) from dawn to 10 AM. Break fast with a brief resting time before afternoon lunch. Such at 1.30 PM followed by afternoon safari in the arid hills of Bera from early evening till dusk. After safari come to resort for freshen up and leave for a theme dinner at JAWAI reservoir. Return to the resort after a beautiful evening at Jawai

Morning safari and evening safari asper day 3 (In the rest hours people who are willing can go for a village safari where you can experience the local tradition with an opportunity to interact and take some memorable portraits) Evening a wildlife movie about Bera and surroundings followed by dinner.

Morning safari followed by break fast at resort. We will check out at 11 AM and leave to our next destination for bigger cats TIGERS. Reach Ranthambore by late evening. Check in to the resort. Dinner and rest for the day to get ready for a Ride a De Tigers next morning.

Tea / coffee at cafeteria followed by morning safari till 11.00 AM. (We can opt for packed breakfast or come back for breakfast). Afternoon safari from early evening to dusk followed by a dinner at 8.00 PM at resort.

A full day opportunity to spend time inside the park with a chance to see as many tigers as possible in their natural habitat. This is a Dawn to Dusk safari with breakfast and Lunch served in the vehicle itself. An opportunity available to very view selected tourists every day and booked in advance to accommodate you. We will return to hotel for an early dinner and retire to bed early for the next day.
